text: Jane Eyre is 2016 opera by Louis Karchin to a libretto by Diane Osen.Millburn duo turns 'Jane Eyre' into an opera ==Recording== Jennifer Zetlan (Jane Eyre), Ryan MacPherson (Mr Rochester), Tom Meglioranza (Roderick Ingram / St. John Rivers), Katrina Thurman (Blanche Ingram), Jessica Thompson (Diana / Mrs. Ingram), Adam Cannedy (Mr. Mason / Mr. Briggs), David Salsbery Fry (Mr. Wood) Orchestra of the League of Composers, Louis Karchin Naxos 2CD 2019 ==References== Category:Operas Category:2016 operas Category:Operas based on novels Category:Adaptations of works by the Brontë family Category:Jane Eyre
title: Jane Eyre (Karchin)
